sentences.english: Abort microspore in crescent or irregular shape. 26.
sentences.chinese: 月牙形和不規則形的敗育小孢子。

sentences.english: In that day the Lord will snatch away their finery: the bangles and headbands and crescent necklaces
sentences.chinese: 到那日，主必除掉她們華美的腳釧，髮網，月牙圈。

sentences.english: It has good characters of high hardness, good wear resistance, hard to form crescent depression etc.
sentences.chinese: 硬度高，耐磨性好，抗月牙窪能力強。

sentences.english: I stood there until the moon had set.
sentences.chinese: 一直的我立到月牙兒落下去。

sentences.english: A custom-made crescent-shaped foam pad to sit you up in comfort.
sentences.chinese: 一個定製的月牙形泡沫墊坐你在舒適度。

sentences.english: Or look at the hippocampus, the crescent-shaped center of long-term memory.
sentences.chinese: 也可以來看看海馬體，那個月牙形的長期記憶中心。

sentences.english: Because of the Tianjin Railway Station, the change in Yueyahe Station.
sentences.chinese: 因爲天津火車站改造，所以改在月牙河火車站了。

sentences.english: Even more…A moon-like lake encompasses an oasis, and a Buddhist temple sits on the green.
sentences.chinese: 還有月牙一樣的清泉，溫婉地包繞着沙漠上的寺廟。

sentences.english: First, he separated the bulbs into the small, sickle-shaped cloves.
sentences.chinese: 首先，他把大蒜剝成月牙狀的小蒜瓣。

sentences.english: Like Crescent Moon-like, distant land hanging in the air.
sentences.chinese: 象月牙兒般，遙不可及地懸掛在空中。

sentences.english: I leaned against the door buttress of the little house, looking at the crescent moon.
sentences.chinese: 我倚着那間小屋的門垛，看着月牙兒。

sentences.english: The first time, the chill crescent moon was really chill.
sentences.chinese: 那第一次，帶着寒氣的月牙兒確是帶着寒氣。

sentences.english: The night sky was unwilling to remain out of the limelight, the crescent moon.
sentences.chinese: 夜幕降臨，天空露出不甘寂寞的月牙。

sentences.english: The Sing Sand Mountain and Crescent Moon Spring is a rare desert view in the world.
sentences.chinese: 鳴沙山月牙泉是世界上罕見的沙漠景觀。

sentences.english: Nobody notices it is getting dark and that the crescent moon has secretly climbed upon the branch.
sentences.chinese: 不知不覺地黑了，月牙兒也悄悄爬上了枝頭。

sentences.english: Six as elder brothers are making reference to a automobile, eyes smile a blind side of crescent moon fashion.
sentences.chinese: 六哥說到車的時候，眼睛笑成了一條月牙形的縫隙。
